# Generating Letters to Selling or Buying Brokerage

You need to print or email a statement to the Buying or Selling brokerage, here are the steps.

* Navigate to Transaction > Commission tab&#x20;
* Do not EDIT the Transaction&#x20;
* Select the SELLING & BUYING COMMISSIONS icon to the right of Gross Commission&#x20;
* Within the Transaction Commission Details window, you will select the WORD icon to the right of the displayed default letter template.&#x20;

![](https://constellation1.na3.teamsupport.com/api/attachments/image/2472652/96e3b881-ad5b-4eca-b2df-9e186602bebd.png)
